message: """"God...your a smart dude..wow!"""" (I probably just seem that way relative to you.) My real point is I'm saying you should listen to the guys who ARE smart dudes... the PhD's in the field. (I asked you where the """"real scientists"""" you mentioned work.) I mean, isn't it odd that you can't find a single actual scientific organization that agrees with you? Surely you can find at least ONE. Otherwise, you're saying every scientific organization on Earth disagrees with you on this, a science issue. Despite your """"real scientists that says the ice mass is growing"""" comment. (Still waiting for your evidence on that one!)
You too scary lol

I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.
